trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션을 포함 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> has a StylusPointCollection that contains <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects collected from a stylus and digitizer.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>에 포함 된 StylusPointCollection <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>스타일러스 및 디지타이저에서 수집 하는 개체입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: You can use the StylusPointCollection to customize the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: StylusPointCollection을 사용 하 여 사용자 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> 지정된 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.target: 길이가 points 은 0입니다.

trans-unit.source: A generic IEnumerable of type <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> that specifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.target: 길이가 points 은 0입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> class that may initially contain the specified number of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> 지정된 된 수의 초기값으로 포함할 수 있는 클래스 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: When you use the StylusPointCollection constructor to create a new <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>, you specify it's `initialCapacity`.
trans-unit.target: 새로 만들 수는 StylusPointCollection 생성자를 사용 하면 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>, 있기 지정 `initialCapacity`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>

trans-unit.source: However, you can add more <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 더 추가할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>호출 하 여 개체는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Add%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> can initially contain.
trans-unit.target: 수가 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> 개체는 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> 처음 포함 될 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: initialCapacity is negative.
trans-unit.target: initialCapacity가 음수입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> class that contains the properties specified in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> 클래스에 지정 된 속성을 포함 하는 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: All <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects added to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> must have a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> that is compatible with `stylusPointDescription`.
trans-unit.target: 모든 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>에 추가 된 개체는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>있어야는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>과 호환 되는 `stylusPointDescription`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> that specifies the additional properties stored in each <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> 각 저장 된 추가 속성을 지정 하는 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: stylusPointDescription is .
trans-unit.target: stylusPointDescriptionis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> class that is the specified size and contains the properties specified in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> 에 지정 된 속성이 포함 되어 있고 지정된 된 크기는 있는 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.%23ctor%2A> constructor to create a new <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> is created with the capacity to hold the specified number of <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.%23ctor%2A>생성자를 만들려면 새 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>용량이 지정된 된 수의 모두 저장할 수를 사용 하 여 만든 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>개체.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can add more <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects than `initialCapacity` by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 더 추가할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>보다 개체 `initialCapacity` 호출 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Add%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> that specifies the additional properties stored in each <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> 각 저장 된 추가 속성을 지정 하는 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> 연관 된는 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> 개체에 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.target: 발생 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Changed"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>이벤트 데이터를 포함 하는.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Finds the intersection of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description*> property.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된의 교차 부분을 찾습니다 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description*>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description*>

trans-unit.source: `subsetToReformatTo` is a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> which describes a subset of values belonging to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: `subsetToReformatTo`이 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>에 속하는 값의 하위 집합을 설명 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A> method to get a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> that intersects the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> of the current <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A>가져올 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A>현재 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> 과 교차 하는</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> 메서드를</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A> 사용 하 여

trans-unit.source: The Reformat method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> that contains the same <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects as those belonging to the current <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 다시 포맷 메서드 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>같은 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>현재 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> 에 속한 것과 개체</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> 를 포함 하</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> 는 반환

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects in the new <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> uses `subsetToReformatTo` as the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>새 개체 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>사용 하 여 `subsetToReformatTo` <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Reformat uses the constraints from the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> property, even if the constraints in `subsetToReformatTo` are different.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 다시 포맷의 제약 조건을 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>의 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A>속성, 경우에도 제약 `subsetToReformatTo` 서로 다릅니다.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>

trans-unit.source: For example, if `subsetToReformatTo` uses the values 0 and 1023 for <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure> whereas <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> uses the values 0 and 255.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 경우 `subsetToReformatTo` 값 0과에 1023을 사용 하 여 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure>반면 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A>값 0과 255를 사용 하 여.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure>

trans-unit.source: Reformat returns a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> using the values, 0 and 255.
trans-unit.target: 반환 형식을 바꿀는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>값을 사용 하 여 0에서 255.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> to intersect with the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> 집합과 교차 하는 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> 현재 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> that has a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> that is a subset of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> and the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> that the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> uses.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> 올려진는 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> 의 지정 된 하위 집합 즉 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> 및 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> 하는 현재 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: subsetToReformatTo is not a subset of the property.
trans-unit.target: subsetToReformatTo하위 집합 않습니다는 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> at the specified position from the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 제거는 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> 에서 지정된 된 위치에는 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The position at which to remove the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 제거할 대상이 되는 위치는 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> is connected to a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> and there is only one <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> 에 연결 되어 한 <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> 하나만 및 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> 에 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> at the specified position.
